titleStmt.title: Bartholmew fayre : a comedie, acted in the yeare, 1614 by the Lady Elizabeths seruants, and then dedicated to King Iames, of most blessed memorie ; The diuell is an asse : a comedie acted in the yeare, 1616, by His Maiesties seruants ; The staple of newes : a comedie acted in the yeare, 1625, by His Maiesties seruants by the author, Beniamin Iohnson.
Plays. Selections
titleStmt.author: Jonson, Ben, 1573?-1637.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.B. for Robert Allot, and are to be sold at the signe of the Beare, in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Each play has special t.p. with same imprint.
Author's name taken from first t.p.
Second volume of "The workes of Benjamin Jonson."--Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Signatures: A⁶ (first leaf blank) B-Y⁴ 2A-2C⁴, ²D-H⁴ I⁶.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Beare, in Pauls Church-yard
